com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Controller

Class CommentManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.DivineInspiration.experimenter.Controller.CommentManager

  • public class CommentManager
extends java.lang.Object
    This class talks to the Firestore database in order to store and retrieve experiment's comment data. The class uses singleton pattern.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  CommentManager.OnCommentsReadyListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when CommentManager successfully queries a list of Comment from Firestore
      static interface  CommentManager.OnRepliesReadyListener
      When reply comment data is retrieved from database is ready, it is passed along as a parameter by the interface method.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addComment(Comment comment, java.lang.String experimentID)
      Adds a new comment to the database
      void addReply(Comment reply, java.lang.String commentID, java.lang.String experimentID)
      Adds a new reply to the database.
      void deleteAllCommentOfExperiment(java.lang.String experimentId)
      Delete all comments of a given experiment from the database
      void getCommentReplies(java.lang.String commentID, java.lang.String experimentID, CommentManager.OnRepliesReadyListener callback)
      Queries all the comments for a given experiment.
      void getExperimentComments(java.lang.String experimentID, CommentManager.OnCommentsReadyListener callback)
      Queries all the comments for a given experiment.
      static CommentManager getInstance()
      Get singleton instance of the class

      Deletes an existing comment from the database.

      • getExperimentComments

        public void getExperimentComments(java.lang.String experimentID,
                                  CommentManager.OnCommentsReadyListener callback)
        Queries all the comments for a given experiment.
        Parameters:
        experimentID - The experiment the comment belongs to
        callback - the class to call after the operation is done. The data is passed as a parameter of this method.

      • getCommentReplies

        public void getCommentReplies(java.lang.String commentID,
                              java.lang.String experimentID,
                              CommentManager.OnRepliesReadyListener callback)
        Queries all the comments for a given experiment.
        Parameters:
        commentID - comment we want to get replies for
        experimentID - the experiment the comment belongs to
        callback - The class to call after the operation is done. The data is passed as a parameter of this method.
